## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G15650](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G15650)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATRGP2, MUR5, RGP2</u>
- **Gene Name:** REVERSIBLY GLYCOSYLATED POLYPEPTIDE 2, MURUS 5, reversibly glycosylated polypeptide 2
- **Description:**   reversibly glycosylated polypeptide 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_148500C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;rgp2-2 mutants have significantly lower levels of UDP-L-arabinose mutase activity compared to wild-type plants and significantly lower levels of arabinose in their cell walls.
